name: Atlantis
short_desc: Self-hosted platform for Mermaid.js diagrams and knowledge management
author: Fantastic Computing Machine
description: Atlantis is a self-hosted platform for creating and managing Mermaid.js diagrams, notes, and knowledge. Features include a modern split-pane editor with live preview, interactive todo lists, full Mermaid.js support, local SQLite persistence, dark/light mode, favorites, search, backup/restore, and diagram version checkpoints.
